text: læa cng ra luk meux mu sa di klaw kæ hmu chn khxng khea wa xo hmu chn khxng chan xey thami phwk than cung tharay chan læa nænxn phwk than ru læw michı hrux wa thæcring chan pen rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ mayang phwk than dangnan meux phwk khea hanhe pi (cak næwthang thi theiyngtrng) xallxhˌ k thrng thahı hawcı khxng phwk khea hanhe xxk pi læa xallxhˌ nan ca mi chinæa thang thi thuk txng kæ hmu chn phu fafun
